channel.title: Locking SoTW voting topics
channel.description: I personally feel as though the voting threads for Sig of the Week should be locked from discussion, because arguments seem to pop up a lot in them, and any other posts are just "I voted for <insert name here>" and are completely unnecessary when you have the poll at the top of the page. I believe the poll should be open, but the topic should be locked.

item.title: Locking SoTW voting topics
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The topic is actually a very important part of the discussion. Moparisthebest never runs any polls without a topic (and I remember on Moparcraft he only used the polls as an indicator, and the actual counting was done via posts). It makes sure that people have real opinions when they post a vote, and arenâ€™t just doing it for friends or whatever. In cases of the previous SOTW where it was full of spam, the users should just be infracted and warned to stop the spam, but discussion should still continue.
